English: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.

d.f: `地~`名~。`位於~`青海省~`西北~`部~。`北部~`與~`東北~`部~`環繞~`著~`祁連山~，`西北~`部~`是~`阿爾金山~，`南部~`是~`崑崙山~。`東西~`長~`約~`八~`百~`五~`十~`公里~，`南北~`寬~`最~`長~`約~`二百五~`十~`公里~。`海拔~`高度~`介~`於~`二~`千~`六~`百~`到~`三~`千~`公尺~`間~，`自~`西北~`向~`東南~`傾斜~，`屬~`溫帶~`沙漠氣候~。`盆地~`內~`沙漠~、`鹽湖~、`鹹水~`沼澤~`遍布~。`蒙古語~「`柴~`達~`木~」`即~「`鹽~`澤~」。`有~`煤~、`石油~、`鹽~`鹼~`和~`石膏~`等~`礦產~。`境內~`日照~`長~，`資源~`豐足~，`有~「`聚寶盆~」`之~`稱~。

English: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
